Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is NMK. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 13 NMK. Mainly the state owne company (Makedonski Shumi) deals with the forestry and wood in the region of Maleshevija. Macedonia 's hunting grounds are leased to 63 hunting associations throughout the country, which protect the game and are intended for local and foreign hunters' recreational hunting. Annual membership fee is 30-40 euros.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Mountain Meleshevija. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is unspecified. Maleshevski mountains are located in the eastern part of the Republic of North Macedonia. The are covers the municipalities of Berovo and Pehchevo, and is characterized with the natural and cultural wealth. Two rivers cross the region, Bregalnica and Strumica. Forests covers 52% of the Maleshevija region, while pastures around 20%.   The size of the area (km2) is 806. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 660. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1932. The total population (in thousand) is 174.341. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 49.3. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -3.00%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 83.4. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been 1.20%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5056. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 769. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 9.80%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 45.60%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 44.53%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 5175. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 9332. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 9.75%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 27.70%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 62.50%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 2088. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is unspecified. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 26003. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 16.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 30.50%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 53.30%.   Hunting and hunting grounds in North Macedonia are characterized by rich vegetation and wildlife that provide good conditions, as well as natural shelters. All the hunting grounds have clean water that enable survival of the wildlife and vegetation. In the hunting area of Maleshevski mountains, there is Wild boar; Fallow deer; Red deer; Wild goat; Rock partridge etc. Given the natural opportunities, Hunting and hunting sports might be an interesting value chain the future. It might be closely linked with tourism, and boost income hunters from abroad.   It s not a big Value Chain. It is a hunting association in the region of Maleshevija, which requires membership for interested hunters in the region. The season is limited to only few months during the winter period. Not many stakeholders involved in the Value Chain. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are Forestry and Natural land. The local assets include Natural, social and cultural.
